imp.core.graphics

Class AbstractGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.graphics.AbstractGraphics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractModelView, TestShader

    public abstract class AbstractGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener
    This class is meant to define the graphics engine of the IMP program such that low end graphics calls are abstracted away from higher level design
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    kreierj
